alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:08AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Rice and southwestern Ellsworth Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 108 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bushton, or 10 miles east of Claflin, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Sterling, Little River, Chase, Holyrood, Bushton, Geneseo, Alden, Lorraine, Frederick and Silica. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central Kansas.
